SNEWS_PT.__main__¶

CLI for snews_pt Right now publish method does not allow extra arguments. While this might be the desired use. I think it should not fail to publish, rather - either mark the extra columns and publish, or - split these columns, publish the fixed template, and report back to user. Manipulations in the publish class can be made see https://stackoverflow.com/questions/55099243/python3-dataclass-with-kwargsasterisk

SNEWS_PT.__main__.main(ctx, env)[source]¶

User interface for snews_pt tools

SNEWS_PT.__main__.publish(ctx, tiers, file, verbose)[source]¶

Publish a message using snews_pub

Notes

The topics are read from the defaults i.e. from auxiliary/test-config.env If no file is given it can still submit dummy messages with default values

SNEWS_PT.__main__.subscribe(ctx)[source]¶

Subscribe to Alert topic

SNEWS_PT.__main__.heartbeat(ctx, status, machine_time, verbose)[source]¶

Publish heartbeat messages. Recommended frequency is every 3 minutes. machine_time is optional, and each message is appended with a sent_time passing machine_time allows for latency studies.

USAGE: snews_pt heartbeat ON -mt ‘22/01/01 19:16:14’

SNEWS_PT.__main__.retract(ctx, tier, number, reason, false_id, verbose)[source]¶

Retract N latest message
